EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Spring Days_Q217.Chicago Email #3 Send - May 23 (new graphic)
EmailTemplate.subject: Last chance to register for Spring Days Chicago
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://www.springdays.io/ehome/spring-days/registration]]> May 30-31, 2017 1871 222 W Merchandise Mart Plaza #1212 Chicago, IL 60654
Register <[[https://www.springdays.io/ehome/spring-days/chicago?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-spring-days-2017]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We’re only one week away from Spring Days Chicago and we want you to join us. During the community event, we will share presentations and participate in open discussions about all things Spring. Seats are limited and we expect to sell out, so register today and don’t miss the opportunity to join members of the Spring community for this exclusive two-day event.
Register now <[[https://www.springdays.io/ehome/spring-days/chicago?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-spring-days-2017]]> for $200.00 USD; space is limited and it will sell out.
Technical sessions from Pivotal & the Spring Community
Blending Product Thinking with Architecture Joel Tosi, Red Green Innovate DevJam Cloud Native Batch Processing Michael Minella, Pivotal
Introduction to Spring Boot Eddu Melendez, Avantica Rethinking RDBMS Data Migration: Modernizing Traditional ETL Processes to Cloud-Native Event-Driven Microservices Anupama Pradhan, HCSC Jeff Cherng, Pivotal
What’s new in Java 9 BIlly Korando, Keyhole Software Solving Planning and Optimization Problems in Real Time Kevin Greene, Spantree
Reactive Spring Josh Long and Mark Heckler, Pivotal Spring Boot-Based Microservices for Deep Learning Applications using deeplearning4j Tom Hanlon, Skymind
Power of Spring Data - How I Wrote a Spring Data Adapter for Spanner Ray Tsang, Google Automated Testing for Digital Experiences Using JUnit 5 Mike Koleno, Solstice
Register now for $200.00 USD, space is limited.
Have questions or interested in hosting? Please contact us at springdays@pivotal.io <[[mailto:springdays@pivotal.io]]>.
We hope to see you there, The Spring Team
